detail: A comprehensive program introducing students to computer science fundamentals, including programming, data structures, and software engineering principles.
eligibility: Open to students from all engineering disciplines with a minimum CGPA of 8.0

detail: This program covers artificial intelligence concepts, machine learning algorithms, neural networks, and practical applications of AI in solving real-world problems.
eligibility: Open to students from CSE, ECE, and Mathematics with a minimum CGPA of 7.5

detail: Learn about data science methodologies, statistical analysis, machine learning models, and big data processing for data-driven decision making.
eligibility: Open to students from CSE, ECE, and Mathematics with a minimum CGPA of 7.0

detail: A program focused on business analytics, combining data analysis, statistical methods, and business knowledge to drive strategic decision-making in organizations.
eligibility: Open to students from all disciplines with a minimum CGPA of 7.5
